Create a sheet with Guests and Free colu: Create a sheet with Guests and Free columns
See the details of the current sheet: See the details of the current sheet
Ends the list, making it possible to sta: Ends the list, making it possible to start a new one
Add names in free column of current list: Add names in free column of current list
This is a bot for you to create the inte: This is a bot for you to create the integration of the excel list of your party's guests with the whatsapp group
You can only have one list in progress p: You can only have one list in progress per group, if there is a list in progress it will be displayed in the title of the group *In Progress*
You can look up commands on sheets using: You can look up commands on sheets using `!help`
When a list is in progress, all messages: When a list is in progress, all messages sent in the group will be sent to excel, so it is recommended that there are no parallel conversations other than names in the group
You can submit names in several ways, se: You can submit names in several ways, send `!input-examples` to see all accepted forms
When creating an event, you create it wi: When creating an event, you create it with the *Guests* and *Free* column
All names are inserted in the Guests col: All names are inserted in the Guests column, to insert one in the Free column, send the prefix `!free` in your message. See more by running `!help`
You can make the bot stop listening for: You can make the bot stop listening for new names by running the `/stop-listening` command. Don't forget to call again when you want to send new names
All successful operations are reacted by: All successful operations are reacted by the bot with an emoji, if not, contact whoever is organizing the event to find out the status of the list.
Listening to new names, use `!stop-liste: Listening to new names, use `!stop-listening` to stop listening to new names
